headline.main: Picasso: Protean and Prodigious, the Greatest Single Force in 70 Years of Art; One Step on a Long Road' A Bull From a Bicycle Seat A Different View income Grew With Fame Collector of Oddments Letters Pinned on Wires Stood for Several Hours Disguises for Visitors Passionate Nationalist Maintained Bond With Spain Scores of Close Friends In Trust for the Nation Invention of the Collage Continued Vitality Marked the Artist's Later Years Lithography and Ceramics Acclaim Mounted With Age

abstract: A Whitman article on Picasso's life and career; illus of various works by Picasso
snippet: There was Picasso the neoclassicist; Picasso the cubist; Picasso the surrealist; Picasso the modernist; Picasso the ceramist; Picasso the lithographer; Picasso the sculptor; Picasso the superb draftsman; Picasso the effervescent and exuberant; Pic...
